name: criptotraker
description: - ✅ Live price updates for **100+ cryptocurrencies** - 📈 Interactive charts for prices, volume & market cap - 🔍 Powerful search and filter by coin name or symbol - ⭐ Favorite your coins for easy tracking - 📊 Market details:   - Market Cap, Volume, Rank   - Supply, Sentiment, Diluted Valuation - 🔁 **Carousel** for top coins (BTC, ETH, USDT, etc.)

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix cripto" "npm run start --prefix node"
